contentList.content: An ethereal sword, forged with celestial fire and wielded by the elite disciples of solar mastery, its edges ablaze with the unfettered fury of dawn's embrace.
Deals an additional [1] if the target is not standing in sunlight.
Deal additional Radiant damage equal to your Proficiency Bonus. On a hit, light erupts around you in a [1] area. Enemies in the light must succeed a DC 13 Constitution Saving Throw or be Blinded.

A celestial bow, that echoes tales of gods and heavenly realms. Each arrow released from this bow seems blessed by divine favor, soaring with precision and power to strike down foes in the name of the divine.
Embraced by the divine, gain a +[1] bonus to Saving Throws against spells.
Unleash a charged projectile that inflicts [1] upon impact and triggers a [3] radius explosion, dealing [2] to anyone within its range.
Triggers a [2] radius explosion that deals [1].
Channel the divine might within to unleash three devastating beams, each imbued with divine wrath and capable of dealing [1].
A fabled relic passed down through generations, said to instill fear even in the mightiest of infernal beings with its very presence.
Gains a +1d4 bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> when attacking undead and fiends.
When a Fiend or Undead attacks you, you can use your reaction to retaliate with a powerful melee attack that deals [1] and [2].
If a Fiend or Undead attacks you, you can retaliate with a powerful melee attack.
Retaliate with a formidable strike when Fiend or Undead attacks you with a melee attack.
Pulls the target creature [1] closer to you. When cast against Undead or Fiends, they suffer an additional [2] and are <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="STUNNED">Stunned</LSTag>.
With each defeated foe, gain a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>, and <LSTag Tooltip="SpellDifficultyClass">Spell Save DC</LSTag>, can stack up to a maximum of +[2].
The affected entity gains a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>, and <LSTag Tooltip="SpellDifficultyClass">Spell Save DC</LSTag>.
Unleash the stored might of your Martial Reckoning, expending all your three <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MARTIAL_RECKONING_3">Martial Reckoning</LSTag> charges to empower yourself in combat.
Expend your three <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MARTIAL_RECKONING_3">Martial Reckoning</LSTag> charges to regain [1].
Expend your three <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MARTIAL_RECKONING_3">Martial Reckoning</LSTag> charges to make your next attack a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag>.
Your next weapon attack is guaranteed to Critically Hit.
Expend your three <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MARTIAL_RECKONING_3">Martial Reckoning</LSTag> charges to create a [1] radius explosion at your location, capable of dealing [2].
Creates a [1] radius explosion, capable of dealing [2].
A blade wrought in darkness, wielding shadow's might with uncanny precision.
You can see in magical and ordinary darkness up to a range of [1].
Unleash a swift, shadow-infused melee strike, dealing [1] + [2]. After the attack, you phase into the <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INVISIBILITY">shadows</LSTag>.
Instantly teleport between shadows, gaining <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on your next melee <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> afterward.
The affected entity gains <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on its next melee <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>.
A commander's steel, gleaming with authority, each strike bears the weight of unwavering justice, commanding the battlefield with dignified presence and guiding the course of battle.
Your every strike carries the potential to draw blood, Possibly inflict Bleeding when you attack (DC13).
Upon delivering the finishing blow, allies within a [1] radius gain temporary hit points equal to your Charisma Modifier (minimum 1).
Unleash a disciplined and commanding strike. Enemies hit by this attack experience a reduction in their combat effectiveness.

The affected target's strikes become less accurate, and its defenses weaken. Suffering a -[1] to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="SpellDifficultyClass">Spell Save DC</LSTag>, and <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag>.
A sacred staff bearing the weight of anubis judgment, delivering retribution to the righteous and the condemned
While in combat, you deal an additional [1] against creatures that haven't taken a turn yet.

Imprison the souls of up to three enemies within your scepter. Those separated from their souls suffer an initial [1]. Their movement speed is halved, and they become vulnerable to further necrotic damage.
The afflicted target has been severed from its soul, suffering a halved movement speed and becoming vulnerable to necrotic damage.

Invoke the power of Anubis and the enigmatic realms of the afterlife as you weave this incantation. Bring forth an ethereal monument veiled in eerie, pale green hues, evoking the essence of lingering souls within the Land of the Dead. Enemies caught within suffer [1].
<LSTag Type="Image" Info="SoftWarning"/> Has no effect on Undead.

Spectral energies shroud any creature that steps into or starts its turn within the otherworldly <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="ELDER_Target_LandOfTheDead">Land of the Dead</LSTag>, inflicting [1]. On a successful save, targets still take half damage.
While inside Anubis' Realm, this entity will [1] every turn as its soul is rended.
Deals [1] to anyone caught inside <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="ELDER_Target_LandOfTheDead">Land of the Dead</LSTag>
Your weapon deal an additional [1] damage while surrounded by [2] or more foes.
A sinister dagger, bearing the haunting legacy of ancient, powerful vampires. With every movement, a haunting whisper accompanies it, promising dread and eternal night to those who cross its path.
Upon reaching 0 <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Points</LSTag>, you recover [1] instead of falling unconscious. This ability renews after a long rest.
Upon reaching 0 <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Points</LSTag>, you recover [1] instead of falling unconscious. This ability renews after a long rest.
Transform yourself into a red mist. It can't fall, and fits through small openings. It is very hard to damage.
While in mist form, you <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Constitution, Dexterity, and Strength <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.

Transformed into a red mist.

Resistant to all non-magical damage, has Advantage on Constitution, Dexterity and Strength Saving Throws, and is tiny in size.

Can't attack, cast spells, or talk.
Summon a legion of vampire bats that surge forward. Affected targets are pushed back and may become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="LOW_CAZADOR_VAMPIREBAT">Swarmed</LSTag>.
Affected entity is <LSTag Tooltip="Vulnerable">Vulnerable</LSTag> to Piercing damage and will take [1] every turn.
A weapon of fabled origin, once held by a heroic dwarf whose legacy echoes in the tales of shattered foes and mountains cleaved in two.
When wielded by a Dwarf this weapon deals extra [1].

With a surge of arcane energy, your body crystallizes into a radiant shield of elemental protection. Fortified by this transformation, you gain <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Fire, Ice, and Lightning.
Affected entity has <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to all elemental damage.
An elven spear of ethereal beauty, echoing the grace of the Eladrin.
When Elf makes attacks while having <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag>, they deal an additional [1].

Sacrifice [1] movement speed. For the next turns, roll melee damage die twice and use the highest result. Additionally, you add your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag> to your melee damage and gain a +2 bonus to your <LSTag Tooltip="ArmorClass">Armour Class</LSTag>.

Roll melee damage die twice and use the highest result. Your melee attacks deal additional [1] based on your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>, and you gain a +[2] bonus to your <LSTag Tooltip="ArmorClass">Armour Class</LSTag>.
Pierce your spear into a creature, dealing [1] + [2] and sending a shiver of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHILLED">Chill</LSTag> through its body.
Channels the primordial fury of the frozen north and unleash a beam of blistering cold and deafening thunder.
Swift as a fleeting dream and agile as a whispered fantasy, each strike is capable of ensnaring the minds of those it touches, blurring the boundary between waking and the world of dreams.
Slice through all nearby foes, making a separate attack rolls against each target within range.

When your off-hand is empty, you score a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> when rolling a 19 and gain an additional <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">Reaction</LSTag> per turn.
Each attack you make carries the potential to imbue <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="HAUNTED_DREAMS">Haunted Dreams</LSTag> upon your foes.

Affected entity cannot move, have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on Strength <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> and 1d4 penalty to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>.
Summon 3 echos of yourself to protect you. As long as one of those copies remain, you are <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistant</LSTag> to Bludgeoning, Piercing and Slashing damage.
When the caster is struck, a Dream Echo will shatter.

Affected entity is <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistant</LSTag> to Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage while a Dream Echo stands. When the caster is struck, a dream echo will shatter and will grants <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="ECHO_OF_SPEED">Haste</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="ECHO_OF_HEALING">Healing</LSTag> and the ability to Retaliate with an attack.

Affected entity is <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistant</LSTag> to Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage while a Dream Echo stands. When the caster is struck, the dream echo will shatter and will <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="ECHO_OF_SPEED">Haste</LSTag> the user.
The caster has + 2 bonus to Armour Class and its movement speed is doubled.

Affected entity is <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistant</LSTag> to Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage while a Dream Echo stands. When the caster is struck, the dream echo will shatter and will heal the user for [1].
When the caster is struck, the dream echo will shatter and will heal the user for [1].

Affected entity is <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistant</LSTag> to Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage while a Dream Echo stands. When the caster is struck, a dream echo will <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="ELDER_Interrupt_DreamEcho_Break">Shatter</LSTag>, striking the attacker directly.
Once struck, your last dream echo detonates and dealing [1] back at the attacker.
Once struck, your last dream echo detonates and dealing [1] back at the attacker.

Within this finely curved bow resides the essence of nature's spirits, woven into its very core. Its bowstring thrums with the symphony of rustling leaves, harmonizing like a chorus of winds dancing through the trees.

Bestowed with nature's protective embrace, you move unhindered through <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DIFFICULT_TERRAIN">Difficult Terrain</LSTag>. You can't be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RESTRAINED">Restrained</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PARALYZED">Paralysed</LSTag>, and gain <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Poison damage.

With a whispered plea to the ancient spirits of the forest, you channel their boundless energy. Releasing a primal surge of force, you deal [1] to those around you, pushing them [2] away. As the verdant essence of the woods envelops you, the forest bestows upon you its <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FOREST_GRACE">Grace</LSTag>.
Enemies have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on ranged attacks against the affected entity.

Sacrifice [1] movement speed. For the next turns, roll ranged damage die twice and use the highest result. Additionally, you add your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag> to your ranged damage and gain a +2 bonus to your <LSTag Tooltip="ArmorClass">Armour Class</LSTag>.

Roll ranged damage die twice and use the highest result. Your ranged attacks deal additional [1] based on your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>, and you gain a +[2] bonus to your <LSTag Tooltip="ArmorClass">Armour Class</LSTag>.
Release a posion-infused projectile dealing [1] and [2] to your target.
Forged in the depths of the Nine Hells, bears the malevolent mark of Asmodeus. Each shot whispers the Prince of Lies' malevolent schemes, a harbinger of doom to those it marks.
When struck by radiant damage, you may use your reaction to retaliate with a hellish flame, dealing [1] and potentially <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INFERNAL_BINDINGS">Binding</LSTag> the target.
When taking Radiant damage, you can retaliate with fiery retribution dealing [1] and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INFERNAL_BINDINGS">Binding</LSTag> the attacker.
After taking radiant damage, you can retaliate with fiery retribution dealing [1] and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INFERNAL_BINDINGS">Binding</LSTag> the attacker.
The afflicted creature is bound by the Nine Hells, it can't move or take actions, bonus actions, or reactions.

Forged from a pact sealed in infernal blood, you wield dominion over the forces of the Nine Hells. As you command, you and any nearby fiends deal an additional [1] to damage dealt with melee weapons. The aura disappears if you fall Unconscious.
The spellcaster and any nearby fiends deal an additional [1] to damage dealt with melee weapons.
Deals an additional [2] to damage dealt with melee weapons within [1] of the spellcaster.
Deals [1] and explodes, dealing an additional [2] to all caught in the flames.
Afflicted creature suffers [1] at the start of its turn, and attackers gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> against it.
Wrought from the crystalline thoughts of a thousand enslaved minds, gleams with malevolent psionic aura. Every strike shatters the barriers of the mind, drawing foes into an abyss of psychic despair.
On successful Critical Hit, you release a burst of psychic energy in a 3-meter radius. <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MINDSHATTER">Shattering</LSTag> the minds of all nearby enemies.
<LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MINDSHATTER">Shattering</LSTag> the minds of nearby enemies upon landing a critical hit.
The target's mind is shattered. The affected entity has disadvantage on Wisdom and Intelligence saving throws.

Unleash a devastating strike infused with psychic energy. On a failed Wisdom <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag>, the targetâ€™s <LSTag Tooltip="Concentration">Concentration</LSTag> is broken and they become afflicted with <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BROKEN_WILL">Broken Will</LSTag>.
Affected entity Armor class is reduced by 3 and movement speed is halved.
Release a burst of malevolent energy, dealing [1] and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DISRUPTION">Disrupting</LSTag> your foes.
Can't take reactions and is <LSTag Tooltip="Vulnerable">Vulnerable</LSTag> to attacks.
Unleash the ancient might of the Illithid, crushing a creature's being with raw psychic power, capable of traversing to two additional targets within an [1] range.
Forged in the heart of Avalon, it radiates with divine light. A powerful blade capable of cutting through darkness and injustice with the authority of a true king.
Heals the user for [1] hit points with each successful hit.
Gains a +[1] bonus to Saving Throws against spells.

Unleash the true power of Excalibur and deliver the King's Verdict! With a resolute swing, a searing wave of righteous light surges forth, dealing [1] and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">Blinding</LSTag> enemies in its path.

With a fervent prayer, you beckon the noble Knights of Camelot from the ethereal realm to aid you in battle. Each spectral knight embodies distinct virtues, lending their unique abilities to your cause.

Summon the Knight of Courage, Sir Lancelot, the Brave, to the battlefield. A paragon of courage and skill. His noble presence bolsters allies and strikes fear into the hearts of foes, for in his spectral form, valor knows no bounds.
"In valor's embrace, I stand unwavering, my blade a beacon of courage!"

Summon the Knight of Fortitude, Sir Percivale, the Unyielding, to join your ranks. A paragon of resilience and unwavering strength. His indomitable spirit bolsters allies, and his unbreakable shield stands firm against all adversaries, a bastion of invincible will on the battlefield.
"For truth and honor, I shall not falter!"

Summon the Knight of Purity, Sir Galahad, the Wise, to lend his ethereal presence to your cause. A paragon of purity and healing. His radiant presence brings clarity and protection, warding off dark influences from the battlefield.
"Where shadows linger, I am the light, the banisher of evil"
Unleash the spirits of divine justice to shield you. Enemies within range take [1], and their movement speed is halved.

Forged under the light of a dying moon by ancient sorcerers, it shimmers with an otherworldly radiance. Each strike releases a burst of celestial light, tearing through the veil between realms. A blade of grace and destruction, it commands the power of the moon itself.
Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Radiant damage and <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on stealth checks
Draw upon the moon's hidden power as you unsheathe the blade, unleashing a swift crescent wave of condensed moonlight that cleaves through enemies in a short-range arc.
Channel the full radiance of the moon as you charge the blade and deliver a devastating downward strike.
Unleash a stinging insult upon a creature, dealing [1] and [2]. The insulted target suffers Disadvantage on its next Attack Roll.
Have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on the next <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>.
The blade burns with celestial fire, illuminating the darkness with the fury of dawn.
Divine energy emanates from the bow, blessed by the gods of Olympus.
Dark energy writhes around the weapon, a remnant of demonic power.
The blade is shrouded in swirling shadows from the realm of Morpheus.
Holy radiance surrounds the legendary blade, a beacon of justice and honor.
Ethereal moonlight flows along the blade's edge, shimmering with lunar power.
A commanding aura emanates from the rapier, inspiring allies with righteous authority.
Ancient Egyptian power manifests around the mace, calling upon the judgment of Anubis.
A crimson mist swirls around the blade, thirsting for blood like the vampiric curse it channels.
Crystalline energy pulses through the warhammer, reflecting the unyielding strength of the earth.
Fey frost and ethereal magic dance along the spear, echoing the grace of the Eladrin.
Psychic energy ripples around the scimitar, weaving dreams and nightmares into reality.
Natural energy courses through the bow, embodying the untamed spirit of the wild.
Infernal flames writhe around the weapon, channeling the wrath of Asmodeus himself.
Arcane force swirls around the greatsword, a maelstrom of raw magical energy.
